name: MoonLanding Project
description:
Let's pilot the lunar module in space!

The goal is to reach the arrival platform before running out of fuel.

Features
  • Admire the accurate modeling of the Moon and the lunar module from Apollo program.
  • Feel the mass of the lunar module and the low gravity on the Moon surface
  • Take up the challenge to pilot safely to the destination

Enjoy the web demo of the version beta 7.

Feel free to give feedback.

Disclaimer

The web version suffers of high variation of the frame-rate, that causes spurious camera shakes. No such issue is observed with the Desktop versions.
